sub_title: Analytics Translator | Program Manager | BIBA | Digital Transformation | PowerBI | Machine Learning
summary: Passionate and result oriented Program Manager with 10+years of experience in Data Analytics, Digitalization, Finance and Project Management areas with a proven track record of successful implementations with international teams. Visionary skills and down to earth planner, capability to be detailed oriented while maintaining the big picture and communicating it to C-Level. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a natural drive to automate and deliver.
